hymn.title: Blessing and honor and glory be Thine

layout.singingstanza: Bless -- ing and hon -- or and glo -- ry be Thine, And glo -- ry be Thine, And glo -- ry be Thine. Bless -- ing and hon -- or and glo -- ry be Thine, Both now and ev -- er -- more. Praise Him! Praise Him! All ye saints a -- dore Him. Praise Him! Praise Him! Both now and ev -- er -- more. Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! Bless -- ing and hon -- or and glo -- ry be Thine, And glo -- ry be Thine, And glo -- ry be Thine, Bless -- ing and hon -- or and glo -- ry be Thine, Both now and ev -- er -- more.

lyrics.stanza: Blessing and honor and glory be Thine, And glory be Thine, And glory be Thine. Blessing and honor and glory be Thine, Both now and evermore.
Praise Him! Praise Him! All ye saints adore Him. Praise Him! Praise Him! Both now and evermore. Hallelujah!
Blessing and honor and glory be Thine, And glory be Thine, And glory be Thine, Blessing and honor and glory be Thine, Both now and evermore.
